price: Yewe Muhanuzi (Muhamadi)! Rwanya abahakanyi n'indyarya ndetse ntuborohere. Ubuturo bwabo ni umuriro wa Jahanamu, kandi iryo ni ryo herezo ribi.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ جَٰهِدِ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱغۡلُظۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu jāhidi al-kufāra wal-munāfiqīna wa-ugh'luẓ ʿalayhim wamawāhum jahannamu wabi'sa al-maṣīru
